message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I think $1,000,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value, but I'm willing to negotiate further if needed.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't sell this product for less than $925,000. It holds significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I understand that the product has significant value, but $925,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $875,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
